sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dpi.ID as PATIENT_ID, dpi.PATIENT_CODE, dpi.ID_TYPE, dpi.NAME, dpi.ID_NUMBER, dpi.NATIONALITY, dpi.DATE_OF_BIRTH FROM hcsal.dbo.ds_cycle dc, hcsal.dbo.ds_data_submission dds, hcsal.dbo.ds_patient_information dpi WHERE dc.ID = dds.CYCLE_ID AND dpi.PATIENT_CODE = dc.PATIENT_CODE AND dds.LOCK_STATUS = 1 AND dc.DS_TYPE = 'ART' <#if arCenterFilter??> AND dc.HCI_CODE = :arCenterFilter</#if> <#if submissionNoFilter??> AND dds.SUBMISSION_NO = :submissionNoFilter</#if> <#if cycleStageFilter??> AND dds.CYCLE_STAGE = :cycleStageFilter</#if> <#if submitDateFromFilter??> AND dds.SUBMIT_DT >= convert(date, :submitDateFromFilter, 103)</#if> <#if submitDateToFilter??> AND dds.SUBMIT_DT < convert(date,:submitDateToFilter,103)</#if>
